posts.post_content: Why not update this to fight?
posts.html:
Why not update this to fight?
Report Abuse  
Posted By: dingophone (11/28/2011 7:16:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: It's not "fight" because they deal their damage at different times before the ability is done resolving. Matters for things like Wither and Infect that alter the power of creatures.
posts.html:
It's not "fight" because they deal their damage at different times before the ability is done resolving. Matters for things like Wither and Infect that alter the power of creatures.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Kryptnyt (3/4/2012 6:22:40 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: [Bloodshot Cyclops](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodshot Cyclops) is a [Fling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fling) effect, [Karplusan Yeti](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Karplusan Yeti) has an [Arena](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arena) effect, so the Cyclops is not actually a better choice, it's a completely different choice.
posts.html:
Bloodshot Cyclops is a Fling effect, Karplusan Yeti has an Arena effect, so the Cyclops is not actually a better choice, it's a completely different choice.
